statements: SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, attendance_date FROM employee_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31';
SELECT employee_name, leave_schedule FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT employee_name, attendance_status FROM employee_attendance WHERE attendance_date = '2023-02-14';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, attendance_date, attendance_status, leave_schedule FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT employee_name, attendance_date FROM employee_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Late' ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE leave_schedule BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM employee_attendance GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance;
SELECT employee_id, hours_worked FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM leave_schedule WHERE leave_type = 'Vacation' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM employee_attendance GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE hours_worked > 8 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY date DESC, hours_worked ASC
SELECT employee_id, date, hours_worked FROM employee_attendance WHERE hours_worked > 8
SELECT employee_id, date, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM employee_attendance GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT leave_type, COUNT(*) AS num_of_leave_days FROM leave_schedule GROUP BY leave_type ORDER BY num_of_leave_days DESC
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date FROM leave_schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance;
SELECT employee_id, date, clock_in_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_details ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date, leave_type FROM leave_schedules WHERE leave_type = 'Paid Vacation';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, position FROM employee_details ORDER BY last_name, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, date, clock_in_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date, leave_type FROM leave_schedules WHERE leave_type = 'Vacation' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department, position FROM employee_details INNER JOIN employee_attendance ON employee_details.employee_id = employee_attendance.employee_id WHERE date = '2021-05-20';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE department='Finance' AND position='Manager';
SELECT name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department='Sales' AND position='Associate';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, position FROM employees ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT e.name, l.leave_type FROM employees AS e INNER JOIN leave_schedules AS l ON e.employee_id = l.employee_id WHERE l.leave_type = 'Paid Leave';
SELECT d.department_name, e.name AS manager FROM departments AS d INNER JOIN employees AS e ON d.manager_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY d.department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, attendance_date, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM employees e JOIN attendance_records a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND attendance_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_name, leave_start_date, leave_end_date, leave_reason FROM employees INNER JOIN leave_schedules ON employees.employee_id = leave_schedules.employee_id;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments WHERE department_id = 101;
SELECT position_title, position_description FROM positions WHERE position_title LIKE '%Manager%';
